Config.RequireBobber.Name: Require Sonar Bobber
Config.RequireBobber.Tooltip: If enabled, the Sonar Bobber will be required for the sonar functionality. If disabled, you will always be able to see which fish is nibbling.
Config.NibbleTime.Name: Extra Nibble Time
Config.NibbleTime.Tooltip: How much extra time in milliseconds the Sonar Bobber will give you to react to a nibble.
